description: This is a comprehensive course that will help you dramatically improve your nature photography.  In the 10 videos, Jim Zuckerman gives you concrete steps on How to Become a Wildlife Photographer by creating stunning landscapes, increasing your awareness of light and how it affects nature photography, capturing powerful pictures of wildlife, paying attention to background elements, macro photography, and much, much more. Jim's instruction isn't theoretical or hard to follow.  It's down to earth easy to understand concepts that you can put into practice immediately.
title: 10 Steps to Dramatic Nature Photography
